the Earth Did Not Move§r

§8§oChristopher M. Graney§r

§72006§r

Comments: \u00a77\u00a7oThe first of two papers (both available on arXiv.org) on the subject of Galileo, stellar parallax, and the motion of the Earth. Of the two, this paper is written for a more general audience. It includes historical

background information and explanation of the general phenomenon ofparallax. The paper is particularly oriented towards use with introductory physics or astronomy classes. Second revision on arxiv (formatting improvements,
typographical error corrections, a few minor wording changes). 16 pages including 3 figures\u00a7r
